The W.M. Berg name is known worldwide for quality and reliability.Our national and international customers include world-renowned companies.
@WMBergInc Rick Batallas is our east Regional Sales Mgr. Handling AL, CT, DE, FL, GA, MA, MD, ME, NC, NH, NJ, NY, PA, RI, SC, TN, VA, VT, WV
@WMBergInc Luke Norlander is our central Regional Sales Mgr. He handles AR, IA, IL, IN, KS, KY, LA, MI, MN, MO, ND, NE, OH, OK, SD, and TX.
@WMBergInc Our west coast Regional Sales Manager is Ed Treyes, he handles the following states - AZ, CA, CO, ID, MT, NM, NV, OR, WA, and WY.
